Projects

SteamLens

Typescript React RESTful API design Express.js Frontend Engineering Backend Engineering

SteamLens is a Chrome extension designed to help streamline the experience of search for information about the next games you want to play. This extension will allow you to quickly view information from various sources in one place. No new tabs, no hassle.

HSREndgameDB.info

Typescript React PostgreSQL Next.js Usability Design

HSREndgameDB is a website designed to allow users to share clears of endgame content in the game "Honkai: Star Rail". Instead of trying to parse through Youtube searches or Reddit, you can now look through HSREndgameDB to find exactly what you want.
